author: tmiychao
content:
With potential timelines for Bellatrix on mainnet, I created estimations of the TTD value for The Merge. Here's a breakdown of estimates and strategy:
https://notes.ethereum.org/@MarioHavel/merge-ttd I'll attend the CL call on Thursday to discuss it as well. I look forward to hearing your thoughts.

author: ajsutton
content: Reminder: The aim is to select the MainNet merge config values (fork epoch and TTD) on this weeks consensus layer call. Aim will be to have client releases out on the 18th/19th of August with those values once we see if there's significant impact from the hash rate drop off of 5Gb mining cards.
